extendedInfo.description: Zambia content from the internet all in one app. News, music, videos, entertainment from various sources on the internet aggregated in one Zambian app. The only Android app exclusively for Zambian content.With this app you can:* See the latest news from Zambia from a number of sources* Watch the latest video clips from Zambia from a number of sources* Read the latest entertainment news from Zambia from a number of sources* See the latest photos from Zambia from a number of sourcesFree for a limited time.

reviews.comment: This is good wayyy to go zambia thank you very much for app. I can finally keep up with the Zambian Tunes :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice app brings lots of Zed content to my HTC desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Commendable effort but dissapointed cuz the app simply loads the TZ website in a webview...its no different from viewing the website on any device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How i feel
reviews.comment: This app is plain horrible..i think its to say am out od here..
reviews.author: Kawaka Yung
